<[[http://bit.ly/2KQU2Sd]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
It's no secret that organizations worldwide are lifting and shifting workloads to the cloud each day. What's surprising is the percentage of organizations that are realizing cost-overruns and performance problems once the migration is complete.
At Turbonomic, we're focused on finding out ways to help organizations reach their goals most efficiently on-premise and in the cloud. To do that, we'd like to learn more about the challenges you are facing. We're hoping that you'll take 3-5 minutes of your time to share your experiences with us. As a thank you for your time, those who complete this survey <[[http://bit.ly/2KQU2Sd]]> will receive a $10 Amazon Gift Card.
<[[http://bit.ly/2KQU2Sd]]>
We look forward to learning more about how we can help.
Thank you, Team Turbonomic
P.S. At the end of the survey, you will have the opportunity to earn an additional $100 Amazon Gift Card
